name: Kano Offshore (Pioneers Inc.)
description:
Kano Offshore is a Casual, Game that consists of two mini-games: Dolphin Aquatic Dance and Narwhal Migration.

The controls set for Kano Offshore: Oceanarium utilizes both graphic user interface and keyboard controls. This means that players will have different gameplay experiences when interacting with the game. Before beginning, players will be instructed on how to play the game. There are no enemies or boss fights available in Kano Offshore. For the most part, the object of the game is fairly simple - play and score as much as you can.

Kano Offshore: Oceanarium is available to PC and Mac users. The minimum system requirements are compatible with most low-spec devices, providing players a smooth gameplay experience.

When launching the game, Unity as the game engine appears along with the company developer, Pioneer Inc., in the loading screen. The user is then taken to the main menu as the title of the game “KANO OFFSHORE: OCEANARIUM” is highlighted on the screen. Under the menu, players have the option to pick from two different mini-games: Dolphin Aquatic Dance and Narwhal Migration.

The instructions, as well as the controls, are shown on the screen before the game begins. When the player completes a game, it displays a scoreboard to indicate the points they have gained.
